bib.title: Rule induction based-on coevolutionary algorithms for image annotation
bib.author: Myszkowski, Pawe{\l} B
bib.venue: Asian Conference on Intelligent Information and …
bib.abstract: This paper describes our experiments in the field of evolutionary algorithms for rule extraction applied to automating image annotation and classification problems. Presented approach is based on classical evolutionary algorithm with binary representation of'if-then'rules. We want to show that some search space reduction techniques make possible to get problem's solution. Paper shows that the gap between classification and image annotation problem can be bridged easily. Some experiments with EA parametrization in
bib.booktitle: Asian Conference on Intelligent Information and Database Systems
